title: Sentic LSTM: a Hybrid Network for Targeted Aspect-Based Sentiment Analysis

tldr.text: A knowledge-rich solution to targeted aspect-based sentiment analysis with a specific focus on leveraging commonsense knowledge in the deep neural sequential model is proposed and shown to outperform state-of-the-art methods in two targeted aspect sentiment tasks.
